title: androidmanchester.co.uk Android app
description: Wrote the forum application for androidmanchester.co.uk. Used to discuss Android coding and receive notices about the group.
features: Push notifications with Google Cloud Messaging
Interfaces with JSON from a RESTful backend
Unit tests using Robolectric and Junit

title: androidmanchester.co.uk RESTful services, Java JSP website and database
description: Wrote website and RESTful backend to the androidmanchester.co.uk app.
features: SimpleTags for component designed JSP architecture
Push notifications with Google Cloud Messaging

title: Kiddicare.com Android application
description: A shopping application for the Kiddicare.com brand

title: Dell Mobile Print
description: Android wireless printing application for Dell, supporting 1.6 upwards, including tablets. Using custom styles and views and a service layer interacting with a proprietary API.

title: Dial00 - Wifi Dialler
description: An Android VOIP app, communicating with an open source C/C++ SIP stack via an Android service.

title: Just Connect - Greetings Cards
description: A nAndroid image and text card sender, via Twitter, G+, Facebook, Email, MMS et al. Uses remote JSON to update the images in the app.

title: VocabTwist
description: First Android project, which uses a custom path-finding algorithm to maximise the number of places that can be used to create words. Helps the user build their vocabulary.

title: Podifi White Label apps
description: A white-label Android application and portable Java SDK that connects wirelessly to a portible Linux device to redeem vochures.
